name: Flibidy La Bird III
description: This totally isn't a copy of flappy bird like how would that happen  i cant hear you its not a copy(i wasted like 7 hours on this(its my first game)bruh) also  forgot to change the high score so till you get higher than 13 your high score is gonna be 13 from the start lol bozo(actually download my game please that will be a w)
